effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire.
This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
